0 CLEAR450,20310:PRINT"TESTING...":GOSUB10:PRINT"TESTING...":GOTO20
10 C1=20309:FORC2=1TO96STEP3:C1=C1+1
11 POKEC1,VAL(MID$("243125233233195000133216000015000212001214084214025214007213234002001215091015000013004235055234",C2,3))
12 NEXT:C1=C1-1:FORC2=1TO80STEP3:C1=C1+1
13 POKEC1,VAL(MID$("00024303723909223909723413823304300023107123103322906612805107412912800000000000000",C2,3)):NEXT:RETURN
14 EXEC20318:RUN
20 GOTO14
